patthana17.12:4.1: Kusalaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.12:4.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana17.12:5.1: Kusalaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.12:5.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana17.12:6.1: Kusalaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.12:6.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
